title: Blue Sapphire
desc: Blue sapphire is a primary color gemstone. Its most common secondary hues are purple, violet, and green.

title: Pink Sapphire
desc: Pink sapphires are the rarest of sapphire colors and bear many similarities to rubies.

title: Yellow Sapphire
desc: Yellow sapphires resemble yellow diamonds and tend to have fewer inclusions than pink or blue sapphires.

title: Red Rubie
desc: Among the most valued gemstones on the market, rubies are durable and range in color from pink to blood-red.

title: Green Emerald
desc: Emeralds are by far the most stunning of the green color gemstones.
